Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~jsong1230 the installed chaincode on peer2 may not be identical to the chaincode that was used to instantiate on the channel. Can yo u make sure the installed chaincodes are identical on all peers before you instantiated ?

Action.author: weeds
Action.body: I put assignee as Jeff Song, since we are looking for some more information. Please reassign to Murali once question addressed. Thanks!

Action.author: clayton sims
Action.body: Jeff any updates on the questions back to you? Â

Action.body: I've changed the priority to low, since the reporter has not responded to multiple queries.

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~jsong1230 will assume this is working for you with latest master (or beta) and close this by 12 June (in about 12 hours)
